content.query:
-- Simple
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/parquet/customers.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- With Fields
SELECT
    Id,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    CompanyName,
    JSON_VALUE(Address, '$.StreetName') AS StreetName,
    JSON_VALUE(Address, '$.Number') AS Number,
    JSON_VALUE(Address, '$.City') AS City,
    JSON_VALUE(Address, '$.Region') AS Region,
    JSON_VALUE(Address, '$.Country') AS Country
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/parquet/customers.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
